summary: A Nazi doctor, along with the Sonderkommando, Jews who are forced to work in the crematoria of Auschwitz against their fellow Jews, find themselves in a moral grey zone.

O'Byrne|Valentin Ganev|Steve Ubels|Velimir Velev|Victor Kalev|Hristo Shopov|Mark Wing-Davey|Ioana Christova|Harry Anichkin|Dobrin Dosev|Portia Reiners
title: La zona gris
